name: LETTER_EDIT_INFO
description: The LETTER_EDIT_INFO table holds audit information for letters. This table contains information pertaining to routing and letter edits.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the note contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: LETTER_AUDIT_COMMENT
columns.description: This field is used to store additional data about a particular audit action (where a letter was printed from, why a letter failed to print, etc...).
